name: Firefox 4: numbered tabs
description:
Adds "…1, …2, ... …9" for convenient control+number (alt+number on linux) switching between tabs.

Also decreases min-width (= more tabs visible while many) and removes max-width (= auto-wide tabs while few), increases font-size; set browser.tabs.animate = false in about:config.
additional_info:
Just quick working app style, this time without images.
Not thoroughly tested, so maybe it will interfere with some tab-related extensions, but "works on my machine" (tm).

Since my old style 3739 with background-image does not work in Fx4, I desperately needed something that works :]

2011-05-13 simplified. added different color (change if clashes with your theme)
2011-05-17 smaller but bold
